item.title: Treatments
item.description: We provide single, daily, weekly, and monthly treatments. Electrostatic Disinfection One of our services harnesses electrostatic disinfection technology. Combative against COVID-19 Kills 99.99% of bacterial, viral, and fungal infections 4-10 minute process Traditional Methods Discussed during consultation.
